remarks: Define class of all star rings.  A star ring is a ring with an involution (conjugation) function.  Involution (unlike say the ring zero) is not unique and therefore must be added as a new component to the ring.  For example, two possible involutions for complex numbers are the identity function and complex conjugation.  Definition of involution in [Holland95] p. 204.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Sep-2011.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2015.)
